title: Is it mandatory to divide the Qurbani / Udhiya into three parts? - Assim al Hakeem
transcript: from india says um is it mandatory to divide this the into three parts no it's not mandatory it is recommended some of the the companions recommended it but it's not mandatory you eat a little bit of it and then if you wish to give it all or to keep most of it and give a bit to the poor or you divide it into three which is the best thing to do but it's not mandatory secondly
